A potential red flag is that Jeremy Lindsey's treatment may be insufficient to pursue a claim. There's also a note indicating that only Chase and Elizabeth were still treating as of January 8, 2025, while Jeremy and Owen had completed treatment. (See details), (See details)

If you could let me know what those limits are and then we can figure out a way that you can tender one of them to the Lindsey's and then we can wait on Dominic to decide what to do with the other one thank you
Aaron Whaley
